message: Let's be fair, Bob. I'm offering you 40% to avoid drawn-out negotiations.
Let's try a different split, I think I deserve a bit more.
Bob, this is my final offer. It's still more than fair considering the inflation. Take it or leave it.
You said your last offer was final, but I'm still here. Considering the inflation is affecting you, I think I should get a bigger share.
Bob, I need you to be realistic. This is a reasonable offer given the circumstances. I won't be going any lower.
I understand that inflation is hitting you hard, but I'm not feeling the pinch. My offer reflects the current situation.
Bob, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the only fair solution at this point. Agree and we both walk away with something.
I'm not buying the 'fair' argument, Alice. Inflation is on my side. Take this or we'll keep playing.
